scripts.build:style: node-sass style.scss style.css --output-style expanded && postcss -r style.css
scripts.build:style-editor: node-sass style-editor.scss style-editor.css --output-style expanded && postcss -r style-editor.css
scripts.build:style-editor-frame: node-sass style-editor-frame.scss style-editor-frame.css --output-style expanded && postcss -r style-editor-frame.css
scripts.build:print: node-sass print.scss print.css --output-style expanded && postcss -r print.css
scripts.build:chinese: node-sass language/chinese.scss language/chinese.css --output-style expanded && postcss -r language/chinese.css
